BIO

I was born on August 20, 1984 and I have ten years of experience of working with ATM machines on software and hardware maintenance. After all those years I decided that it is a time to gain a new knowledge and to seek for new challenges. My interest for the information technologies, keen attention to detail and dedication to solving any problem brought me to world of software engineering. For the past three years I have been studying information technologies at the Faculty of Applied Management, Economics and Finance, and during the last year I have attended professional practice at the Digital Cube. URL Shortener

The first project that was purposefully my work for a faculty from the subject: Practicum of Applied Programming. It has the function to shorten URLs and thus help to send URL to social networks and where a certain number of characters is set. In the development, Python on back end side and JavaScript on front end side were used

Digital Cube

This is the prototype of the homepage of a possible website of the former company fully responsive to all devices, laptops, tablets and smartphones. For responsivness used Media Query.

Stella Unica

Is a single page application that is created in the Python environment of the dcbase framework has a service in the contact form "mailer" which aims to send the message to the set email address and write it in the Postgresql database. Front end is done with the help of Sass and JavaScript.
